name: H2BS SPV0 PublicTest V2
description:
The highly anticipated racing game have been updated.

Game currently have these features:

  • Customise type of race that you want to participate in all in one page (Level Selection) (Racing, Time Attack) (Opponent Count) (Level Laps) (Time Limit)
  • Sandbox level allow player to test vehicle technical parameters in many test situations.
  • 6 Cars to choose with different  vehicle parameters.
  • 6 levels to play (1 Sprint A to B level and 1 Circuit Loop).
  • Dummy AIs that will try hard to finish the race and ya maybe won't be able to win. Maybe. :)))

The game has debug features:

  • Integrated SRDebugger inside the game - Activate this feature by left click three times on the top left corner screen in the game window.
  • (Only use to see PC SPECIFICATIONS, CPU and RAM usage).

Controller Type: KEYBOARD + MOUSE ONLY, no support for gamepad

Key Controls:

  • W or Up Arrow - Accelerate the car
  • A/D or Left/Right Arrow - Steer car left and right
  • S or Down Arrow - Reverse the car
  • N - Boost the car speed
  • C - Change the car camera position
  • ESC or P - Pause Game

Hope you enjoy this new public test version 2 :}

Thanks, hoanglongplanner
